mapper.select:
select m.fid as id,m.FNAME_L2 as title,m.FDESCRIPTION_L2 as description,m.fnumber as num, m.FLONGNUMBER as longNumber,m.flevel,m.FPartCostCenterID as costCenterId,m.FISLEAF as isLeaf, m.FSIMPLENAME as simpleName from T_ORG_BASEUNIT m
m.FISADMINORGUNIT=1 and m.FIsOUSealUp=0
and m.fid=#{id}
and m.FNAME_L2 like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{title}),'%')
and m.fnumber like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{num}),'%')
and m.fid in (select fid from T_ORG_Company)
order by m.FLONGNUMBER
select FIsBizUnit as unit from T_ORG_Company where fid=#{id}
select fisbizunit as unit from T_ORG_CostCenter where fid=#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select m.fid as id,m.FNAME_L2 as title,m.FNUMBER as num,m.FLONGNUMBER as longNumber, m.FSIMPLENAME as simpleName,cc.FCOSTCENTERTYPE as costCenterType,cc.FISBIZUNIT as isBizUnit from T_ORG_BASEUNIT m left join T_ORG_OUPartCostCenter cc on cc.fid=m.FPARTCOSTCENTERID
m.FIsOUSealUp=0
and m.FID in
#{item}
and m.FPARTCOSTCENTERID in (select fid from T_ORG_OUPartCostCenter) and cc.FIsBizUnit=1
order by m.fnumber

select m.fid as id,m.FNAME_L2 as title,m.FNUMBER as num,m.FLONGNUMBER as longNumber, m.FSIMPLENAME as simpleName,m.FISLEAF as isLeaf,m.FDESCRIPTION_L2 as description, fi.FISBIZUNIT as isCompany from T_ORG_BASEUNIT m left join T_ORG_OUPartFI fi on fi.FID=m.FPARTFIID
m.FIsOUSealUp=0 and exists (select fi.fid from T_ORG_OUPartFI fi where fi.fid=m.FPartFIID) and not exists (select m1.fid from T_ORG_BASEUNIT m1 where m1.FPARENTID=m.fid)
and m.FNAME_L2 like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{title}),'%')
and m.FNUMBER like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{num}),'%')
and m.FLONGNUMBER like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{longNumber}),'%')
and fi.FISBIZUNIT =#{isCompany}
order by m.FLONGNUMBER
